Description: 8 fragments of cylindrical segmented beads made of faience, mostly white, one of them shows traces of a turquoise glaze. The longest one has 17 segments.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amara West (Nubia), E14.3 in ink, E14.4 in pencil
Acquisition notes: Formerly housed by the Birmingham Museum and Art Gallery and the EES London.
